plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I give you air to breathe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I'm often very tall.
🍃 I have leaves.
☀️ I need the sun to grow.

plant.question: I am a plant that can be red, yellow, pink or white. I smell lovely and sometimes have thorns. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.
🌹 I am a popular flower.
💧 I need water to stay beautiful.

plant.question: I grow underground, and rabbits love to eat me. I am orange and good for your eyesight. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny eats me.
👁️ I help you see better.

plant.question: I am tall and green. Birds build nests in me. I lose my leaves in the fall in some places. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves change color.
🪵 I can be used to build houses.

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can eat me raw or cooked. Sometimes I am pickled. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I'm used to make pickles.
🥗 I'm often put in salads.
🥪 I am refreshing in the summer.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm places.
🌰 I am a type of nut.
🥥 You can drink my milk.

plant.question: I am a grain that grows in fields, and people make bread out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am often golden in color.
🍞 I am a key ingredient in toast.
🚜 Farmers harvest me.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in water. Ducks like to swim among me and frogs sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I often have lily pads.
🦆 I provide shelter to many animals.
💧 I live in ponds and lakes.

plant.question: I am a climbing plant with purple or green fruits. My fruits are juicy and sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 Juice and jelly can be made from me.
☀️ I love sunshine.

plant.question: I'm a plant that lives in the desert. I have needles instead of leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I can store a lot of water.
🏜️ I thrive in dry places.
☀️ I can be tall or small.

cosmos.question: I am the big, bright star you see during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot!
🌞 I help plants grow.
🌎 Earth goes around me.

cosmos.question: I am the bright object you often see at night. I change shapes throughout the month. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am full and round.
🐺 Werewolves like me.
🌎 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas that is very far away and twinkles at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I look small, but I'm really big.
🌌 There are many of me in the sky.
🔭 You can sometimes see me through a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a big, round object that travels around a star. Earth is one of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I can have land, water, and air.
🪐 Some have rings around them.
☀️ I orbit the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I called?

hints.text: 🐻 Some are named after animals.
📜 Ancient people used to tell stories about me.
✨ You need dark skies to see me well.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I'm not a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be found in the asteroid belt.
💥 Sometimes I collide with planets.
🪐 I am much smaller than the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that travels around the Sun and has a long, bright tail. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am sometimes called a 'dirty snowball'.
☀️ My tail always points away from the Sun.
☄️ I visit the inner solar system periodically.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🥛 Our one is called the Milky Way.
🌌 There are billions of me in the universe.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that even light cannot escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am formed from the death of a very massive star.
🕳️ I am like a cosmic vacuum cleaner.
🌌 Scientists study me, but can't see me directly.

cosmos.question: I am everything that exists: all space, time, matter, and energy. What am I?

hints.text: ♾️ I am constantly expanding.
🌌 I contain billions of galaxies.
🔭 Scientists are still trying to understand me.
